pr_title: Fix runtime visible code type annotation redefinition assertion

timeline.message:
Fix runtime visible code type annotation redefinition assertion

Need to check the method code attribute for runtime visible type
annotations so that an entry can be added to the cpHashTable used for
writing out .class files from romClasses. Omitting this will cause an
assertion failure at `ClassFileWriter::indexForType`.

Tests are added to verify the correct behaviour.

Signed-off-by: Tobi Ajila <atobia@ca.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: Probably better to use the JVMTI Allocate function instead of malloc.
timeline.author: gacholio
gacholio
